Nourhan you mentioned you tried " the socialsharing plugin" ... I am quite sure  nobody here knows what that is, it seems like a very generic thing.
In order to get people to help you, you should show steps of what you did and what errors did you encountered.
Let me quote something from Stackoverflow:
"Focus on questions about an actual problem you have faced. Include details about what you have tried and exactly what you are trying to do."
One last thing, please read "How do I ask a good question?"
 http://stackoverflow.com/help/how-to-ask
I want to know is there a way in javascript to post to many social media accounts at a click ?!
See? that's a start! You want to use "JavaScript" to post to many social networks. where did you get from there?
well my scenario is to make the user login with his social accounts then write any post in my application and click " post " button make him post the content in all of his logged in accounts !!

This web API support  a lot of social networks: https://docs.oneall.com/api/ , you can use it by JS, PHP, Python and .NET

Here is a sample request to publish a new message to several social networks:

https://docs.oneall.com/api/resources/social-sharing/publish-new-message/
